A Caring Recovery Network

Peaks Recovery Centers are nationally accredited, gender specific, addiction treatment programs in Colorado, specifically designed for young adults 18-30.

Gender Specific

Peaks Recovery Centers are among a very short list of extended care, gender specific treatment facilities within the state of Colorado. In fact, we are the only gender-separate treatment facility in the state of Colorado offering a full six-months of clinical services.

Verify Insurance

Colorado Springs Counseling Services

Peaks Recovery Services is a community based IOP program serving the greater Colorado Springs area. Our program specifically works with both young adults (18-35) and working professionals who struggle with substance use disorder and process addictions. We also incorporate an integrative dual diagnosis approach as part of treatment.

Read More -->

Dual Diagnosis Treatment

Dual Diagnosis refers to individuals who struggle with both a mental illness and substance use disorder. Often times, mental health issues are the root causes for prolonged substance use. By addressing the underlying issues of the substance use disorder, treatment becomes more effective and individuals are able to develop longer, more reliable coping mechanisms in the process.

Read More -->

Intake Process

Extended treatment matters, national relapse rates for individuals coming out of 30-45 day programs is around 75% within the first year. If an individual can stay sober for up to a year, relapse rates plummet by over 50%. Whether you are coming from a treatment program or not, we offer a wide variety of clinical services to help you get back on your feet. Click below to get started.

By submitting this form, I agree to be contacted by Peak Recovery Centers.

A Caring Recovery

Call Now

Everyday millions of individuals and their families are affected by substance use disorder. Studies show that the longer young adults participate in treatment programs and stay active in their recovery, the more likely it is that they will achieve long-term sobriety and stability. We believe it paramount to the long-term success of young adults and their recovery that they continue with extended care treatment. Our client’s personal growth and recovery from alcohol and substance abuse is our highest priority. It’s why we do what we do. At Triple Peaks and Serenity Peaks we value how special your loved one is and we are committed to their long-term recovery and personal growth.
